column1: Iowa governor orders workers back to work or else. After this day, anybody who loses a loved one in Iowa to #coronavirus can be forgiven if they go to extremes.
I am incensed at the Illinois governor's demand workers go back to work or else. I cannot legally express my hate. #coronavirus
We had two down days in #coronavirus deaths and now we likely have two more over 2k. I was hoping we had turned a corner.

To the silly person laughing about violating social distancing doesn't realize it will not be "let's see who gets sick this weekend" but who is sick two to three weeks from now and who is dead in June and July. #coronavirus
